sentences.sContent: Boats are readily available to visitors.
sentences.sCn: 游客可以很方便地租到船只。

sentences.sContent: The information is readily accessible on the Internet.
sentences.sCn: 这些信息在因特网上一查就能找到。

sentences.sContent: ...but at least the most senior were cushioned by a more readily available social safety net...
...Feeding birds has become so popular that prepared feed mixtures are readily available...

synos.tran: 容易地；乐意地；无困难地

phrases.pCn: 易接近的；易达到的；可存取的

remMethod.val: read(y)(有准备的， 情愿的) ＋ ily → 乐意地

words.tran: 准备好；现成的；迅速的；情愿的；快要…的
敏捷，迅速；准备就绪；愿意

trans.tranCn: 乐意地， 欣然地； 容易地； 很快地， 立即
